page.title: 03A DAY IN THE LIFE OF........
page.content: I get up about 7:30am,and have breakfast of tea and toast.I go to the bus-stop at 8:00am to catch the school bus at 8:00am.I travel 18km to school and get there about 9:00am.Lessons start at 9:30am and after the first two periods we have a break of 15 mins.After another three periods I go for school dinner.The break last for 1:50pm and afternoon lessons continue till 3:50pm.I get home at 4:20pm and do homework for up to an hour.After that I play football or ride my bike until tea time.After tea I may go to my Grandads who lives at {Scatness } about 1.65km away.He has land that is used for crops,and I help him.On Tuesdays and Thursdays after 7pm I help out at the shop working in the store.After working I usually go to { {Hayes Sands}for a work and sometimes fish for cole.I go to bed at 10pm.
